thread.title: John Bolton Changes U.S.-North Korea Equation

author: John Lyons
title: John Bolton Changes U.S.-North Korea Equation
text:
SEOUL—John Bolton’s appointment as U.S. national security adviser adds an unpredictable variable to efforts to organize a U.S.-North Korea summit.
After President Donald Trump agreed this month to meet North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, Mr. Bolton, in a television interview, dismissed Pyongyang’s offer of talks as a mere ploy to buy time as it develops nuclear arms.
Mr.... RELATED VIDEO Trump Accepts Invitation to Meet North Korea's Kim Jong Un In a historic diplomatic breakthrough, President Donald Trump accepted an invitation from North Korean leader Kim Jong Un to meet "as soon as possible." News of the summit was announced by a senior South Korean official at the White House Thursday evening. To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
